title: Practitioner-Oriented Instructional Design-Based Language Learning Experience Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and grasp of instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Learner-centered design emphasizing task applicability for current practitioners. Development of strategic learning experiences for comprehensive assessments

learning_goals: Cultivate learners' ability to analyze and design language learning materials (text/multimedia) independently.
Develop three types of learner-customized activity scenarios applying teacher-led design principles.
Design a language education module integrating instructional design elements (objectives, assessment, materials, methods).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
